Package org.example.Strategy

Class SpanishStrategy

java.lang.Object
org.example.Strategy.SpanishStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
MovesStrategy
public class SpanishStrategy extends Object implements MovesStrategy
Class implements MoveStrategy interface where all methods are described. Class with applied moves roles from Spanish version of the game. In this version: normal pawn can not beat back, King can move multiple fields, normal pawn can beat up a king.
